content:
"function four_corners(x, y, a, w, h)
    r = sqrt((h/2)^2 + (w/2)^2)
    return map([h/2, h/2, -h/2, -h/2],
               [w/2, -w/2, -w/2, w/2]) do Δh, Δw
                   # 1. compute theta
                   θ = atan(Δh, Δw)
                   x1 = x - cos(θ + a) * r
                   y1 = y + sin(θ + a) * r
                   (x1, y1)
               end
end"
